title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Sustainabilityrelated Disclosures in the Financial Services Sector) (Amendment) Regulations
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Sustainabilityrelated Disclosures in the Financial Services Sector) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: 2. The European Union (Sustainability-related Disclosures
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Sustainability-related Disclosures 

the 
Financial Services Sector) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 146 of 2021) are 
amended, in Regulation 3, by the deletion of paragraph (a). 

in 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 December, 2022. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L 317, 9.12.2019, p. 1. 
2 OJ No. L 198, 22.6.2020, p. 13. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th December, 2022.
